title: Production/Analysis/Editing
description: Social documentation students in the final phase of completing their master's thesis receive guidance in shaping their projects, receive feedback, and are taught key elements of structure and narrative at a time when the demand for clarity and social documentation exposition is crucial.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): SOCD 294A and SOCD 294B. Enrollment is restricted to social documentation graduate students.
